title: Charging Your UA Band | Under Armour HealthBox
description:
In this video, learn how to charge your UA Band.

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: the battery of your ua band can last up to five days when the battery is getting low connect it for about 30 minutes to get a full charge. To charge the ua band plug the USB cable into a power source like your computer attach it to the charging cable that came with it when attaching the cable make sure that the dot mark on the charger is align with the marker on the band. The indicator light on the band will turn red when it's charging once your band is fully charged the indicator light will turn green now you're ready to own your day with the ua band.
